title: Narratives and Reflections of Networked Learning
description:
Our narratives and reflections are the 'footprints' and 'handprints' that we leave behind as we travel along this path of  professional growth in the Primary Math LT-ST Network.  It is about leaving a legacy for our fellow teacher leaders to learn from our experiences. 

A narrative of our learning will be recorded in this blog after every face-to-face meeting.   All members are strongly encouraged to pen their reflections by clicking on 'reply' to a blog.  You may continue with our face-to-face professional conversation,  share your thoughts or your experience of how you have translated this learning into your teaching.  You may also invite input for an idea you have or a piece of work-in-progress.  All these behaviours are characteristics of a teacher-leader!  The Math Master Teachers look forward to your active contribution to build this knowledge.
